about.description: Returns information about the current Uniface installation, version, and platform.

abs(value).description: Return the absolute value of a numeric value.

acos(value).description: Return the arc cosine of value.

applname.description: Return the name of the Application Shell.

applproperties.description: Set the presentation properties of the application shell.

appltitle.description: Return or set the window title bar text of a Uniface Windows application.

asin(value).description: Return the arc sine of value.

atan(value).description: Return the arc tangent of value.

model name.description: Return the value of the Model property (the suffix of the entity name) of the specified entity

putitem(list, index, element).description: Add or replace an item in a list.

putitem/id(list, id, element).description: Add or replace an item in a list.

putitem/id/case(list, id, element).description: Add or replace an item in a list.
